About

I'm Christopher, a student of Computer Science, and my site here is to provide resources for any fellow Computer Science or programming students. I plan on posting like this is a personal blog, whilst gearing it more towards programming, or computers.

However, my hobbies also include automotive design and mechanics, woodworking, photography, and travel. If you're interested in any of those things too, then come back and check in for those posts every now and again.

This is my site, for all my projects, both personal and school based, along with the documentation. Hopefully, I'll have my other hobbies posted on here, like my photography, writing, drawing, etc.
